short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace all occurrences of "Trump" with "Fart" and other easter eggs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you sick of groaning in agony every time you read a story about our next President? Well turn that frown upside-down with the Mr. Trump Fart Swap extension.  All instances of Donald Trump will be replaced with "Mr. Fart" and all instances of "Trump" will simply be replaced with "Fart".  There are some other Easter eggs around the web, especially on his Twitter page.
